text: Junying Zhang , born 27 May 1976) is a road cyclist from China. She represented her nation at the 2004 Summer Olympics. She won at the 2004 Asian Cycling Championships the women's road race. She also rode at the 2003 UCI Road World Championships. ==References== ==External links== * profile at Procyclingstats.com * page at sports.sina.com.cn Category:1977 births Category:Chinese female cyclists Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Cyclists at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of China
title: Zhang Junying
